title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: goal flowcluster provide functions example datasets clustering OD origin-destination datasets. process can useful visualising large OD datasets analysing patterns data. Install package : , local development, clone repo, open project RStudio, run:
code: # see if the workflows are working: gh run list if (!requireNamespace("pak", quietly = TRUE)) {   install.packages("pak") } pak::pkg_install("Hussein-Mahfouz/flowcluster") devtools::load_all() #> ℹ Loading flowcluster
